   Chain email
   stated on January 11, 2008:

     * National

   Angie Drobnic Holan
   By Angie Drobnic Holan January 11, 2008

Not a Muslim; not Mohammed

   An anonymous chain e-mail claims Barack Obama could be a covert Muslim and
   his middle name is Mohammed.
First off, Barack Obama's middle name is not Mohammed; it's Hussein.

The e-mail also raises the possibility that Obama is a "covert" Muslim at
   the same time it attacks his membership in the Trinity United Church of
   Christ, a Christian denomination.
